arts.ttl: Tranmere Rovers v Cheltenham Town RECAP: Off-colour Robins beaten on the Wirral
arts.sum: Cheltenham Town suffered a 2-0 defeat at Tranmere Rovers in League Two on Friday night. Tranmere Rovers (3-4-3): McGee; O'Connor, Turnbull, Wood; Norman, Finley, Merrie, Patrick (Bradshaw 90+2); Hawkes (Jennings 73), Dennis (Saunders 90+2), Hendry (Morris 86).

arts.ttl: Tranmere earn much-needed League Two win over Cheltenham to boost survival bid
arts.sum: A first half Kristian Dennis header and in injury-time strike from Cameron Norman made the difference.

arts.ttl: Bradford City loanee and "potential captain" Sam Stubbs high on Cheltenham Town boss Michael Flynn's summer transfer window wishlist
arts.sum: Cheltenham Town manager Michael Flynn has expressed his desire to re-sign central defender Sam Stubbs this summer. “He always puts the team first and if he makes a mistake he’s the first one to put his hands up in the dressing room and say: ‘I’ve made a mistake but we could’ve done X, Y and Z’.

arts.ttl: Joy Seppala one of several parties interested in Cheltenham Town takeover - chairman David Bloxham - Gloucestershire Live
arts.sum: “There are currently four very credible parties interested and even this week through the Football League we’ve had another name that has come forward," he said. Some supporters raised their concern over Seppala after her role at Coventry, under the Sisu group, resulting in steep decline, stadium issues and major financial complications at the football club.

arts.ttl: Players thinking they've cracked it, bad day at the office and Tom King progress - Cheltenham Town boss Michael Flynn after MK Dons defeat
arts.sum: I felt it in the warm-up because it was a flat and it was almost like they thought 'MK have won two of their last 17, so all we have to do is turn up and win because we're at home' but it doesn't work like that and football has a very consistent habit of slapping you in the face when you think like that. The frustrating thing today if we'd won we are only six points off because teams have lost.
